<h1 align="center"><a id="user-content--robot-go-karuna-karuna-go-warning-" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#-robot-go-karuna-karuna-go-warning-"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="india" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f1ee-1f1f3.png">🇮🇳</g-emoji> <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="robot" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f916.png">🤖</g-emoji> Twitter Automation Bot <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="microbe" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f9a0.png">:rocket:</g-emoji><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="warning" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/26a0.png">:fire:</g-emoji> </h1>

<ul>
<li> Deploy a web based automation tool on cloud</li>
<li> Understand how automation can be used to scale social media following</li>
<li> Work on OCR and understand it</li>
  
</ul>

<h3><a id="user-content-tech-stack-of-this-project" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#tech-stack-of-this-project"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Tech Stack of this Project:</h3>
<ul>
<li>Language: Python3</li>
<li>Dependencies: APS Scheduler, PyTesseract, GSpread</li>
<li>Libraries: Available in <a href="https://github.com/VirtualGoat/Twitter-Automation/blob/master/requirements.txt">requirements.txt</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p></p>

<h3><a id="user-content-to-run-this-project" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#to-run-this-project"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>To run this Project:</h3>

<ul>
<li>Clone this repo and pip install the requirements </li>
</ul>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell"><pre>git clone https://github.com/VirtualGoat/Twitter-Automation.git
<span class="pl-c1">cd</span> Twitter-Automation
pip install -r requirements.txt
python automation_script.py</pre></div>

10.7341C2.75152 10.4913 2.89904 10.2707 3.085 10.085L5.585 7.585C5.77074 7.39904 5.99132 7.25152 6.23411 7.15088C6.47691 7.05023 6.73716 6.99842 7 6.99842C7.26283 6.99842 7.52308 7.05023 7.76588 7.15088C8.00867 7.25152 8.22925 7.39904 8.415 7.585C8.55717 7.71748 8.74522 7.7896 8.93952 7.78617C9.13382 7.78274 9.3192 7.70403 9.45662 7.56662C9.59403 7.4292 9.67274 7.24382 9.67617 7.04952C9.6796 6.85522 9.60748 6.66717 9.475 6.525C9.14999 6.19995 8.76413 5.94211 8.33947 5.7662C7.91481 5.59029 7.45965 5.49974 7 5.49974C6.54034 5.49974 6.08518 5.59029 5.66052 5.7662C5.23586 5.94211 4.85001 6.19995 4.525 6.525L2.025 9.02499C1.36858 9.68141 0.999817 10.5717 0.999817 11.5C0.999817 12.4283 1.36858 13.3186 2.025 13.975C2.68141 14.6314 3.57169 15.0002 4.5 15.0002C5.4283 15.0002 6.31858 14.6314 6.975 13.975L8.225 12.725C8.35748 12.5828 8.4296 12.3948 8.42617 12.2005C8.42274 12.0062 8.34403 11.8208 8.20662 11.6834C8.0692 11.546 7.88382 11.4672 7.68952 11.4638C7.49522 11.4604 7.30717 11.5325 7.165 11.665L5.915 12.915C5.72925 13.1009 5.50867 13.2485 5.26588 13.3491C5.02308 13.4498 4.76283 13.5016 4.5 13.5016C4.23716 13.5016 3.97691 13.4498 3.73411 13.3491C3.49132 13.2485 3.27074 13.1009 3.085 12.915Z"></path></svg></a>Flow of project:</h2>
<ol>
<li>
<p>User uploads an image containing text</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>The text from the image gets extracted using Pytesseract</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>The extracted text gets stored in an online google sheet</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>The stored text gets popped row by row from the Google sheet and uploaded on Twitter at 5 hour intervals</p>
</li>
</ol>
 
<h4><a id="user-content-this-project-still-has-scope-of-development-so-you-can-also-contribute-to-this-project-as-follows" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#this-project-still-has-scope-of-development-so-you-can-also-contribute-to-this-project-as-follows"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>This project still has scope of development, so you can also contribute to this Project as follows:</h4>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://github.com/VirtualGoat/Twitter-Automation">Fork</a> this Repository.</li>
<li>Clone your Fork on a different branch:
<ul>
<li><code>git clone -b &lt;name-of-branch&gt; https://github.com/VirtualGoat/Twitter-Automation.git</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>After adding any feature:
<ul>
<li>Go to your fork and create a pull request.</li>
<li>I will test your modifications and merge changes.</li>
 </ul>
 </li>
 </ul>
